text: Ezɨ bulmakaubar mɨn graziba apir asɨziba, dar soroghafariba puzir pumuning ikia, aning uaning tuiragha itir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn ia bar dar aman markɨ. Asɨzir kamaghɨn gariba: kamelba, ko ivarareba, ko ighɨaba, ia dar amam markɨ. Da bulmakaubar mɨn graziba apava, soroghafarir puziba bigha pumuning itir puvatɨ. Ia kamaghɨn fogh, asɨzir kamaghɨn amiziba da Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir puvatɨ. An adar aman ian anogoroke.
